title: ONE MONTH FREE PET FRIENDLY ONE Bedroom
posting_body: ["Bunker Hight's Apartment Homes is conveniently located in the business and cultural heart of Downtown L.A. China Town.", 'Each of our Los Angeles apartments presents excellent one-bedroom or two-bedroom floor plans.', 'Beautiful views of the downtown skyline, spacious kitchens, large living and dining areas, and more await you on Bunker Hill.', 'From your contemporary hilltop hideaway with sweeping views of the L.A. skyline, the city unfolds before you… and the luxury of Los Angeles surrounds you.', 'Take in everything that China Town apartments have to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Controlled Access with Private Underground Parking', '-Spacious 1, 1+Den and 2 Bedroom Floor Plans', '-Closed-Circuit Security system', '-Designer', 'Granite Countertops', '-Close to Shopping & Freeways', '-Central Heating and Air Conditioning', '-In unit Washers and Dryers', '-Rooftop lounge area', '-Refundable Pet Deposit', '-EV Chargers at 25 cents per Kwh in your parking space', '-Brand NEW BUILDING', '-Kitchen Island', 'ONE MONTH FREE ON APPROVED CREDIT', '** DISPLAYED', 'RENTAL PRICING INCLUDES PROMTIONAL DICOUNT **', 'one bedroom one bath 1+1  2 bedroom china town downtown Hancock park luxury living luxury apartments little Tokyo south park fashion district']
